AIConfiguration.msdyn_customconfiguration: {"version":"GptDynamicPrompt-2","prompt":[{"type":"literal","text":"You are writing an award nomination message for the following recipient type: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"awardtype"},{"type":"literal","text":" for the following award: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"award"},{"type":"literal","text":" . The purpose is only to describe why the person(s) have been nominated for the "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"award"},{"type":"literal","text":" . Utilize the user provided "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"contribution"},{"type":"literal","text":" to help write your message. Do not include a salutation or closing within the message. Use singular for single and team recipient type, and plural for the multiple recipient type. The recipient(s) is/are: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"awardee"},{"type":"literal","text":" . Write a short message that is less than 750 characters. Keep the message short and to the point. It must never be longer than 750 characters or 120 words. The message must be written in a professional tone of voice and be in the first person."}],"definitions":{"inputs":[{"id":"awardtype","text":"awardtype","quickTestValue":"multiple"},{"id":"award","text":"award","quickTestValue":"Creativity in Problem-Solving Award"},{"id":"contribution","text":"contribution","quickTestValue":"Excellent job creating solutions for difficult technical issues and platform related constraints."},{"id":"awardee","text":"awardee","quickTestValue":"Jared Howard, William Wenzel"}],"data":[],"output":{"formats":["text"]}},"modelParameters":{"modelType":"gpt-35-turbo","gptParameters":{"temperature":0}}}
